subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: One last phone call and the words of a stranger prompted Dre’ Kirkpatrick, a top high school defensive back, to say “Roll Tide” on national signing day.
snippet: One last phone call and the words of a stranger prompted Dre’ Kirkpatrick, a top high school defensive back, to say “Roll Tide” on national signing day.
